title: [REQ–001] Design request confirmation UX (pre-provisioning)
body:
## User Story
As a **user of CyberOctopus**
I want a clear confirmation screen before provisioning starts
So that I can verify inputs, risk level, TTL, and resources before committing.

## Description
- Add a dedicated confirmation page summarizing: CVE, blueprint, components, attack vector, severity, TTL, and guardrails
- Show editable input summary (Edit Inputs)
- Include Confirm Request button to trigger provisioning pipeline
- Include quick-pick recent CVEs section

## Acceptance Criteria
- Confirmation screen matches design mockup
- All fields populated from blueprint + system defaults
- Edit Inputs returns user to chat/input stage
- Buttons behave predictably and layout works on desktop resolutions

title: [REQ–002] Implement blueprint summarization API
body:
## User Story
As a **backend engineer**
I want to generate a safe, structured JSON summary of the requested lab blueprint
So that the UI can render a reliable confirmation view.

## Description
- API endpoint to provide blueprint summary: target system, attack vector, CVE metadata, components, severity
- Validate the request against allowed CVEs and rules
- Enforce tenant boundaries

## Acceptance Criteria
- GET/POST API returns normalized blueprint JSON
- Only supported CVEs and configurations are allowed (invalid → 400)
- No client-supplied tenant_id or overrides accepted
- OpenAPI spec updated

title: [REQ–003] Severity gate and risk assessment backend
body:
## User Story
As a **platform owner**
I want to enforce automated risk scoring for requested labs
So that dangerous environments require approval or additional checks.

## Description
- Risk engine inputs: CVE severity, exploit type, lab components, user role, tenant policy
- Output: risk_class (Low/Med/High/Critical), rationale, approval_required flag
- Store results per request

## Acceptance Criteria
- Risk assessment computed deterministically for same inputs
- High/Critical requests automatically set approval_required=true
- Assessment stored with request_id
- Tests cover sensitive cases: RCE, privilege escalation chains, attack surface expansion

title: [REQ–004] Implement approval workflow (if required)
body:
## User Story
As a **tenant admin or reviewer**
I want to approve or reject high-risk requests
So that dangerous labs cannot be created unintentionally.

## Description
- Add approval_required state to request
- Add API for admin/reviewer to approve/reject
- Add UI indicators (Pending, Approved, Rejected)
- Block provisioning pipeline until approved

## Acceptance Criteria
- If approval_required=true, Confirm Request triggers a Pending state instead of provisioning
- Admin dashboard allows approval/rejection
- Request cannot proceed until approved
- Unauthorized users cannot bypass approval

title: [REQ–005] TTL validation & auto-cleanup rules
body:
## User Story
As a **user**
I want to understand TTL rules before provisioning
So that I know how long my lab will live and when auto-cleanup occurs.

## Description
- Display default TTL, max extension, auto-cleanup toggle
- Backend validation to enforce TTL caps
- Enforce tenant policy limits

## Acceptance Criteria
- UI shows TTL settings clearly
- Changes validated server-side
- Requests that exceed policy limits return informative errors
- TTL metadata stored with request

title: [REQ–006] Resource limits panel (CPU/Memory/Sessions)
body:
## User Story
As a **user**
I want to view resource usage and limits before confirming a request
So that I understand the cost and constraints.

## Description
- Display CPU usage %, memory %, session limits, active labs count
- Pull data from usage quotas API
- Highlight if request exceeds limits

## Acceptance Criteria
- UI reflects real usage values
- Red/yellow indicators when above thresholds
- Backend enforces quotas as part of request validation
- Errors are human-friendly (e.g. 'Max Labs Reached')

title: [REQ–007] Confirm Request API – start provisioning job
body:
## User Story
As a **user**
I want to confirm my request and trigger lab creation
So that the provisioning pipeline begins.

## Description
- POST /labs/request/confirm endpoint
- Validate blueprint, risk assessment, and TTL rules
- Create provisioning_job entry
- Return job_id for provisioning screen

## Acceptance Criteria
- Confirm Request transitions request→provisioning_job
- Valid request returns job_id
- Invalid request returns detailed 4xx errors
- OpenAPI updated

title: [REQ–008] Wire confirmation screen to backend
body:
## User Story
As a **user**
I want all UI panels (blueprint, guardrails, TTL, resources) to reflect real data
So that everything is correct before I confirm.

## Description
- Connect UI components to blueprint summary API
- Connect to risk assessment + TTL + resource limits APIs
- Support Edit Inputs and Confirm Request actions

## Acceptance Criteria
- Every field on confirmation screen is populated from backend APIs
- User can edit inputs and return without losing chat context
- Confirm Request triggers backend confirm endpoint and navigates to provisioning page
- UI handles loading and error states cleanly
